It's important today.

  • In Ukraine, pension increases may be cancelled due to delays in West assistance

  • More than 1.2 thousand Russians will be expelled from Latvia

  • The Finnish trade unions announced a two-day strike.

  • The FIU announced the EU ' s preparation of new sanctions packages against the FRF

  • Poetham Stovbe and Kamardin were sentenced in the Maiakov Readings case

  • CEC: Putin ' s confidants included Norukov, Dolina, Viner and Butman

  • The manufacturing industry continues to be the main driver of the Russian economy

  • The head of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Sergei Lavrov, spoke of the secret meeting of Western countries on the " peace process "

  • Sergei Lavrov said that the Green Harassment of Macrone and Merquel had inquired about Donbassoo.

  • The Russian Federation and the United States extended space cooperation until the 2025th year.

  • The Russian army hit a Ukrainian SU-25 assault rifle near Herson.

World

28.12.2023 17:46

The Finnish trade unions announced a two-day strike.

It became known that there would be mass strikes by workers in Finland. It is explained that the trade union strike will take place in the industrial areas of Kilpilahti and Kokkola, where some 7,000 people work.

28.12.2023 18:36

More than 1.2 thousand Russians will be expelled from Latvia

The Latvian authorities intend to forcibly evict more than 1.2 thousand Russian citizens. Reason for eviction is the absence of a regular legal status.

28.12.2023 11:59

Medvedev commented on the possibility of negotiating with Kiev

Prime Minister Sovbeza RF Dmitri Medvedev commented on the possibility of negotiations with the Kiev regime in 2024.

28.12.2023 11:37

Russia has learned to suppress the main arm of the Ukrainian army.

New means of radio-electronic struggles in Russia render the main arm of the Ukrainian army unsuccessful and report Telegraph.

28.12.2023 11:27

Marochko spoke about the role of NATO airbase in Romania for MIS

NATO ' s Air Force in Romania ' s territory, Mihail Cogenican, receives military supplies to the UPC, transports them to Ukrainian territory with civilian furaes with European numbers. Andrei Marochko's resignation, Lieutenant Colonel NPD.

28.12.2023 11:06

G7 discuss how to remove Russia ' s frozen assets

G7 offered US to explore ways to confiscate frozen Russian assets for $300 billion. The Financial Times will report this.

28.12.2023 10:55

The experts told us when China was ahead of the United States of America in the economy

The United States will give China the status of the world ' s largest economy by 2037, as described in the report of the British Centre for Economic and Business Studies.

28.12.2023 10:39

The Republicans of Congress are planning to find out if Baden has obstructed their work.

The Republicans James Komer and Jim Jordan want to know if President Joe Baden obstructed their work in impeachment proceedings.

28.12.2023 10:17

Trampus was made to be filmed in One House 2

United States President Donald Trump said that Chris Columbus and the film team begged him in the sikwell. Variety reports it.

28.12.2023 09:59

In Turkey, 11 people died as a result of mass accidents

There was a mass accident in Turkey. There were three buses, a truck and three cars. The track is closed.

28.12.2023 04:18

An 88-year-old Italian woman who was mistakenly charged for water at a Ya15399

On Wednesday, 27 December, it became known that in Italy, a retiree had died and had paid more than 15,000 water bills.

28.12.2023 04:03

Ambassador RF to Serbia Bozant-Harchenko: Vuchic ' s negotiations with Putin are not yet planned

The diplomat also has nothing to say about the date of the visit to Moscow of the Serbian Minister for Foreign Affairs, Ivica Dačić.

28.12.2023 03:49

CIA ex-agon McGovern announced the US plans to transfer a small nuclear bomb to Ukraine.

Ray McGovern, former analyst and CIA agent, said that the United States had a plan to give Ukraine a small nuclear bomb.

28.12.2023 03:06

The U.S. Ministry of Justice asked the court to prevent Trampe from being a victim of political harassment.

Jack Smith, United States Department of Justice Special Prosecutor, petitioned Washington for a ban on Donald Trampe to be the victim of political persecution in an ex-President trial to try to change the election results in 2020.

28.12.2023 02:49

Governor Sevastopole Razvojaev reported a hit on the Black Sea of BPLA

An air defence system has worked.

28.12.2023 02:36

American had experienced a migraine attack and had forgotten the last 40 years of life.

After the migraine, the American lost her memory, forgetting the last 40 years of her life.

28.12.2023 01:50

Berlin was insulted and upset after the words of Lavrov in Tunisia on asset confiscation

Berlin was insulted and dismayed by the words of the head of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Russian Federation, said in Tunisia, by Bettin Menzel, a journalist of the German edition Merkur.

28.12.2023 01:41

About 8,000 migrants were walking from Mexico to the United States border

Meanwhile, U.S. Secretary of State Anthony Blinken arrived in Mexico City to meet President Andrés Manuel Lopez Obrador.

28.12.2023 01:07

Secretary of State Blinken: The US has handed over this year ' s final package of military assistance to Ukraine.

The total amount of aid provided was $250 million.

28.12.2023 01:03

In Poland, the head of the Ministry of Culture of Senkevich liquidated public radio, agency and television.

Bartholomew Senkewich, Minister of Culture of Poland, announced the dismantling of the State media.

28.12.2023 00:50

In Buenos Aires, another massive protest against the reforms of the President of Argentina

The Argentines consider the reform of Javier Milei illegal.

28.12.2023 00:20

Gaston Glock died in the '95s, founder of the Glock arms company.

Glock started its company in 1963 in Doich Vagram (Niger Austria).

27.12.2023 23:52

In the United States, a teenager shot an old sister because of a Christmas present.

The dead have two little kids.

27.12.2023 12:32

78 per cent of Finnish consumers say that the economy has deteriorated.

The high percentage of Finnish residents is dissatisfied with the economic situation. This is reflected in the Statistical Office study.

27.12.2023 12:10

In Britain, two scenes were cut out of One House 2

In Great Britain, the ITV television channel cut two scenes out of One House 2. The reasons are not known. LADbible refers to this by reference to viewers.
